txt.en: When the odds are against you and the battle seems lost, can you rally and find a way to win?  Defeat the final bosses of the instance with just one Ent standing. Be a true hero!
Defeat the three trolls with only one Ent alive
To earn this deed, you must defeat the three trolls with only one Ent left alive.
To earn this deed, you must defeat the three trolls with only one Ent left alive.
You have defeated the trolls in the most difficult of ways.
